headline: UniCredit to offer wealthy clients Blackstone's private equity fund
summary: MILAN (Reuters) -Italian bank UniCredit said on Wednesday it was widening its partnership with Blackstone to start offering its wealthier clients a private equity fund, an asset class normally reserved for professional investors.  UniCredit first partnered with the world's largest  alternative asset manager in July last year, by making Blackstone's European private credit fund available to clients of its wealth management business.
